Package com.onlinepayments.sdk.client.android.session

Class SessionEncryptionHelper

java.lang.Object
com.onlinepayments.sdk.client.android.session.SessionEncryptionHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
EncryptDataAsyncTask.OnEncryptDataCompleteListener, PublicKeyAsyncTask.OnPublicKeyLoadedListener, PublicKeyAsyncTask.PublicKeyListener
@Deprecated public class SessionEncryptionHelper extends Object implements EncryptDataAsyncTask.OnEncryptDataCompleteListener, PublicKeyAsyncTask.OnPublicKeyLoadedListener, PublicKeyAsyncTask.PublicKeyListener
Deprecated.
In a future release, this class will become internal to the SDK. Use Session.preparePaymentRequest(PaymentRequest, Context, PaymentRequestPreparedListener) to encrypt your Payment Requests.
Session contains all methods needed for making a payment.

  • Constructor Details

    • SessionEncryptionHelper

      @Deprecated public SessionEncryptionHelper(android.content.Context context, PaymentRequest paymentRequest, String clientSessionId, SessionEncryptionHelper.OnPaymentRequestPreparedListener listener)
      Deprecated.
      use SessionEncryptionHelper(PaymentRequest, String, Map, PaymentRequestPreparedListener) instead.
      Helper for encrypting the payment request.
      Parameters:
      context - used for reading device metadata which is sent to the Online Payments gateway
      paymentRequest - the PaymentRequest that will be encrypted
      clientSessionId - the sessionId that is used to communicate with the Online Payments gateway
      listener - SessionEncryptionHelper.OnPaymentRequestPreparedListener that will be called when encryption is completed

    • SessionEncryptionHelper

      @Deprecated public SessionEncryptionHelper(PaymentRequest paymentRequest, String clientSessionId, Map<String,String> metaData, SessionEncryptionHelper.OnPaymentRequestPreparedListener listener)
      Deprecated.
      Use SessionEncryptionHelper(PaymentRequest, String, Map, PaymentRequestPreparedListener) instead
      Helper for encrypting the PaymentRequest.
      Parameters:
      paymentRequest - the PaymentRequest that will be encrypted
      clientSessionId - the sessionId that is used to communicate with the Online Payments gateway
      metaData - the metadata which is sent to the Online Payments gateway
      listener - SessionEncryptionHelper.OnPaymentRequestPreparedListener that will be called when encryption is completed
